mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.platoon_id AS "platoonId", a.platoon_name AS "platoonName", a.project_id AS "projectId", a.project_name AS "projectName", a.week AS "week", a.classes AS "classes", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.status AS "status"
mapper.insert: insert into mt_course( platoon_id, platoon_name, project_id, project_name, week, classes, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, status ) values ( #{platoonId}, #{platoonName}, #{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{week}, #{classes}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{status} )

insert into mt_course
platoon_id,
platoon_name,
project_id,
project_name,
week,
classes,
create_by,
create_date,
update_by,
update_date,
remarks,
status
#{platoonId},
#{platoonName},
#{projectId},
#{projectName},
#{week},
#{classes},
#{createBy},
#{createDate},
#{updateBy},
#{updateDate},
#{remarks},
#{status}
mapper.update: update mt_course set platoon_id = #{platoonId}, platoon_name = #{platoonName}, project_id = #{projectId}, project_name = #{projectName}, week = #{week}, classes = #{classes}, create_by = #{createBy}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}

update mt_course
platoon_id = #{platoonId},
platoon_name = #{platoonName},
project_id = #{projectId},
project_name = #{projectName},
week = #{week},
classes = #{classes},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_date = #{createDate},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_date = #{updateDate},
remarks = #{remarks},
status = #{status}
where id = #{id}
